messages.subject: Re: zoombinis
messages.msgSnippet: Like when I do the finances and put my cute little highlights and stamp the bills PAID lolololol. I am really *playing* in my own head even if I am actually
messages.messageBody:
Like when I do the finances and put my cute little highlights and
stamp the bills PAID lolololol. I am really *playing* in my own head
even if I am actually taking care of real life business. I think
there is that "SHIFT" of thinking with many things. I believe my
perspective changes this??? :)It is hard to do on many a daily
chores, yet when I do this task I'm right back to being 8 yrs old
and playing "grown-up or Real estate" in my *office*.

Ticia
(who needs to go and look up Zoombinis as I have no idea what you
are talking about and am going on my own tangent??? :) )


--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, SandraDodd@a... wrote:
> "-- Enjoy the captivating gameplay experience. With the Zoombinis
unique
> puzzles, it feels like you're playing a game, not learning a
lesson. "
>
> I just got an e-mail from the Zoombinis people. Some of you
probably did too.
> This one line struck me funny, though. "It feels like you're
playing...not
> learning..."
>
> All of life can be that way!
>
> Sandra

messages.subject: zoombinis
messages.msgSnippet: -- Enjoy the captivating gameplay experience. With the Zoombinis unique puzzles, it feels like you re playing a game, not learning a lesson.  I just got an
messages.messageBody:
"-- Enjoy the captivating gameplay experience. With the Zoombinis unique
puzzles, it feels like you're playing a game, not learning a lesson. "

I just got an e-mail from the Zoombinis people. Some of you probably did too.
This one line struck me funny, though. "It feels like you're playing...not
learning..."

All of life can be that way!

Sandra
